created_by: Victor Sergeev, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, Gleb Sukhodolskiy, Timur Zinniatullin, oscd.community, Tim Shelton, frack113 (split)
name: Wow6432Node Classes Autorun Keys Modification
description: Detects modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry.
false_positives: Legitimate software automatically (mostly, during installation) sets up autorun keys for legitimate reason
Legitimate administrator sets up autorun keys for legitimate reason
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:/[Ss][Ee][Tt][Vv][Aa][Ll][Uu][Ee]/ AND registry.path:/.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Ww][Oo][Ww]6432[Nn][Oo][Dd][Ee]\\[Cc][Ll][Aa][Ss][Ss][Ee][Ss].*/ AND registry.path:(/.*\\[Ff][Oo][Ll][Dd][Ee][Rr]\\[Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll][Ee][Xx]\\[Ee][Xx][Tt][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll][Ff][Oo][Ll][Dd][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Ee][Ww][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Ff][Oo][Ll][Dd][Ee][Rr]\\[Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll][Ee][Xx]\\[Dd][Rr][Aa][Gg][Dd][Rr][Oo][Pp][Hh][Aa][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ee][Rr][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Ff][Oo][Ll][Dd][Ee][Rr]\\[Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll][Ee][Xx]\\[Cc][Oo][Ll][Uu][Mm][Nn][Hh][Aa][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ee][Rr][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Dd][Ii][Rr][Ee][Cc][Tt][Oo][Rr][Yy]\\[Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll][Ee][Xx]\\[Dd][Rr][Aa][Gg][Dd][Rr][Oo][Pp][Hh][Aa][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ee][Rr][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Dd][Ii][Rr][Ee][Cc][Tt][Oo][Rr][Yy]\\[Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll][Ee][Xx]\\[Cc][Oo][Pp][Yy][Hh][Oo][Oo][Kk][Hh][Aa][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ee][Rr][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Cc][Ll][Ss][Ii][Dd]\\\{[Aa][Cc]757296\-3522\-4[Ee]11\-9862\-[Cc]17[Bb][Ee]5[Aa]1767[Ee]\}\\[Ii][Nn][Ss][Tt][Aa][Nn][Cc][Ee].*/ OR /.*\\[Cc][Ll][Ss][Ii][Dd]\\\{[Aa][Bb][Ee]3[Bb]9[Aa]4\-257[Dd]\-4[Bb]97\-[Bb][Dd]1[Aa]\-294[Aa][Ff]496222[Ee]\}\\[Ii][Nn][Ss][Tt][Aa][Nn][Cc][Ee].*/ OR /.*\\[Cc][Ll][Ss][Ii][Dd]\\\{7[Ee][Dd]96837\-96[Ff]0\-4812\-[Bb]211\-[Ff]13[Cc]24117[Ee][Dd]3\}\\[Ii][Nn][Ss][Tt][Aa][Nn][Cc][Ee].*/ OR /.*\\[Cc][Ll][Ss][Ii][Dd]\\\{083863[Ff]1\-70[Dd][Ee]\-11[Dd]0\-[Bb][Dd]40\-00[Aa]0[Cc]911[Cc][Ee]86\}\\[Ii][Nn][Ss][Tt][Aa][Nn][Cc][Ee].*/ OR /.*\\[Aa][Ll][Ll][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm][Oo][Bb][Jj][Ee][Cc][Tt][Ss]\\[Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll][Ee][Xx]\\[Dd][Rr][Aa][Gg][Dd][Rr][Oo][Pp][Hh][Aa][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ee][Rr][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll][Ee][Xx]\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Pp][Ee][Rr][Tt][Yy][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ee][Tt][Hh][Aa][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ee][Rr][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll][Ee][Xx]\\[Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Ee][Xx][Tt][Mm][Ee][Nn][Uu][Hh][Aa][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ee][Rr][Ss].*/)) AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.Details:/\([Ee][Mm][Pp][Tt][Yy]\)/)))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((winlog.event_data.EventType:SetValue AND registry.path:*\\Software\\Wow6432Node\\Classes* AND registry.path:(*\\Folder\\ShellEx\\ExtShellFolderViews* OR *\\Folder\\ShellEx\\DragDropHandlers* OR *\\Folder\\ShellEx\\ColumnHandlers* OR *\\Directory\\Shellex\\DragDropHandlers* OR *\\Directory\\Shellex\\CopyHookHandlers* OR *\\CLSID\\\{AC757296\-3522\-4E11\-9862\-C17BE5A1767E\}\\Instance* OR *\\CLSID\\\{ABE3B9A4\-257D\-4B97\-BD1A\-294AF496222E\}\\Instance* OR *\\CLSID\\\{7ED96837\-96F0\-4812\-B211\-F13C24117ED3\}\\Instance* OR *\\CLSID\\\{083863F1\-70DE\-11d0\-BD40\-00A0C911CE86\}\\Instance* OR *\\AllFileSystemObjects\\ShellEx\\DragDropHandlers* OR *\\ShellEx\\PropertySheetHandlers* OR *\\ShellEx\\ContextMenuHandlers*)) AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.Details:\(Empty\))))`
